meanings.definition: A line on a map connecting points of equal value.
meanings.sent1: The isopleth on the map shows where the temperature is the same.
meanings.sent2: We used the isopleth to find areas with the same elevation.
meanings.sent3: The isopleth on the map looked like a squiggly snake trying to find its way.
meanings.sent4: The isopleth acted like a magical thread connecting all the points of equal value.
meanings.sent5: The isopleth on the map was as clear as a bold black line drawn with a marker.

meanings.definition: A curve on a graph representing points of equal value.
meanings.sent1: The isopleth on the graph helped us see where the data points were equal.
meanings.sent2: The isopleth curved smoothly, showing where the values matched.
meanings.sent3: The isopleth on the graph looked like a rollercoaster ride for numbers.
meanings.sent4: The isopleth on the graph was like a bridge connecting all the equal points.
meanings.sent5: The isopleth on the graph made the equal values stand out like shining stars.
